text: Florida modern is an architectural style. According to professor Jan Hochstim, Florida modern reflects wider development than the Sarasota modern school. Architect Cecil Alexander designed one house in this style. (47 pages, with figures and 16 photos) ==See also== *Miami Modern Architecture *Sarasota School of Architecture *Architecture of Jacksonville ==References== ==External links== *Florida History & the Arts Category:American architectural styles
title: Florida modern
